channel.title: DEVOLUTION[474] How to make PvP wilderness ONLY?[474]
channel.description:
Hi,
I have a 474 source that has PKing everywhere except in certain places (banks etc.) basically like a PvP World. How can I make it so that PKing ONLY takes place in wilderness and that you get what the other person has?
Thanks.
-Valance

item.title: DEVOLUTION[474] How to make PvP wilderness ONLY?[474]
item.dc:creator: @Valance Valance
item.description:
@Valance wrote:

No, sorry

Read full topic

item.title: DEVOLUTION[474] How to make PvP wilderness ONLY?[474]
item.dc:creator: @Valance Valance
item.description:
@Valance wrote:

[quote=“RuneSpace, post:2, topic:347350”]All i could find in my Client.java is this when i search isinwilderness

IsInWilderness = true;

I’d image you would… See what happens o_O

I can code a bit but I’m not pro…[/quote]

item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Have you tried looking in the source? It sounds as if you think every source is the same and such. Try looking for stuff like isInWilderness, or some things that would declare what is safe zone or not.
